# CMake command, generate .cxx and .h from .fl files
FLTK_WRAP_UI(cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEvents clientUI.fl serverUI.fl)

# name the main executable and specifies with source files to use
ADD_EXECUTABLE(cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEvents
               # code files to compile
               fltkMutex.cpp
               clientTask.cpp
               serverTask.cpp
               main.cpp
               # header files are provided for information
               fltkMutex.h
               clientTask.h
               serverTask.h
               # files generated by fluid
               ${cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEvents_FLTK_UI_SRCS}
	       )

# this program 
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEvents ${FLTK_LIBRARIES})

# link with the cisst libraries
CISST_REQUIRES(cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEvents "cisstCommon;cisstOSAbstraction;cisstMultiTask")


# compile network version if ICE is available
if (CISST_MTS_HAS_ICE)

  # CMake command, generate .cxx and .h from .fl files
  FLTK_WRAP_UI(cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEventsServer serverUI.fl)

  # name the main executable and specifies with source files to use
  ADD_EXECUTABLE(cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEventsServer
                 # code files to compile
                 fltkMutex.cpp
                 serverTask.cpp
                 serverMain.cpp
                 # header files are provided for information
                 fltkMutex.h
                 serverTask.h
                 # files generated by fluid
                 ${cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEventsServer_FLTK_UI_SRCS}
	         )
  # this program 
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEventsServer ${FLTK_LIBRARIES})

  # link with the cisst libraries
  CISST_REQUIRES(cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEventsServer "cisstCommon;cisstOSAbstraction;cisstMultiTask")


  # CMake command, generate .cxx and .h from .fl files
  FLTK_WRAP_UI(cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEventsClient clientUI.fl)

  # name the main executable and specifies with source files to use
  ADD_EXECUTABLE(cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEventsClient
                 # code files to compile
                 fltkMutex.cpp
                 clientTask.cpp
                 clientMain.cpp
                 # header files are provided for information
                 fltkMutex.h
                 clientTask.h
                 # files generated by fluid
                 ${cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEventsClient_FLTK_UI_SRCS}
                 )

  # this program 
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEventsClient ${FLTK_LIBRARIES})

  # link with the cisst libraries
  CISST_REQUIRES(cisstMultiTaskFLTKCommandsAndEventsClient "cisstCommon;cisstOSAbstraction;cisstMultiTask")

endif (CISST_MTS_HAS_ICE)
